# comfyui-models

Model library and model path hygiene for ComfyUI. Use when installing or troubleshooting models, mapping model types to folders, configuring additional model paths, or resolving “missing model/encoder” errors. Use only when the user explicitly mentions ComfyUI, ComfyUI workflows, custom_nodes, models/, ComfyUI-Manager, comfy-cli, or paths under this repo.
